description.value: Stranger to the Cult: Although forge world born citizens know that the Emperor is their god and saviour, they see the Imperial Creed through the lens of Cult Mechanicus doctrine. As a result, they can be surprisingly—and sometimes dangerously—ignorant of the common teachings and practices of the Ecclesiarchy, often failing to offer its clerics the level of deference they expect.

system.benefit: You suffer a −10 penalty on Tests involving knowledge of the Imperial Creed and a −5 penalty on Fellowship Tests to interact with members of the Ecclesiarchy in formal settings.
system.notes: -10 to Imperial Creed knowledge, -5 Fellowship with Ecclesiarchy
